body:
Comment 16: 
> the first CTR ciphers appeared in openssh 3.7

(Over a decade ago!)

People don't have to throw their hardware away, they can continue using whatever they
have been using for the past ten or more years. But we don't have to support it in Go.

If we're doing the work to support other, reasonable ciphers anyway and the CBC slot
comes for free, then sure, but we shouldn't put in any effort to support it.
